links.title: Does Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) Have A Healthy Balance Sheet?
links.description: David Iben put it well when he said, 'Volatility is not a risk we care about. What we care about is avoiding the permanent loss of capital.' It's only natural to consider a company's balance sheet when you examine how risky it is, since debt is often involved when a business collapses.

links.title: Biden social and climate bill clears procedural vote in House, where it still awaits final approval
links.description: WASHINGTON - The House of Representatives passed a key procedural vote early Saturday morning to line up eventual passage of the Build Back Better Act, President Joe Biden's signature social safety net and climate change bill. The party-line vote came soon after the House late Friday night passed the $1 trillion, Senate-approved bipartisan infrastructure bill, which will now go to Biden's desk.
